algorithm_technique: Iterate through the list, identifying groups of increasing lengths. Reverse groups with even lengths.
problem_summary_simple: Reverse nodes in linked list groups that have an even number of nodes.
problem_summary_technical: Traverse list, determine group lengths, reverse even-length groups in-place, reconnect.
key_insights: The group lengths follow a sequence: 1, 2, 3, 4, ...
Need to carefully track the end of the previous group to correctly link the reversed group.
The reversal of a sublist within the main list requires managing multiple pointers (prev, curr, next, and the start of the next group).
